_sText:
This is a prestart of a prefab of an android. Its called R2V1 and looks much like the R2s on Star Wars Series, but he has a gun and can be turned onto a bomb. He is inteligent and tries to kill who is in his front.

Legend:

Eye Green - Everything is disabled, he is friendly.
Red Eye - The turret is on, whach out!
Blue Eye - The sensor bomb is enabled, but the turret can be too.

To use on HL2, you will need to change some textures or add them to the game.
